resources.string: Pro Sms Sender App requires the Storage Permission in order to read the contact number list file.
Pro Sms Sender App requires the Sms Send permission in order to send sms to contact number list file.
The selected file is empty. Please select file of user contacts.
Please first select .txt contact list file.

In order to send bulk sms to your customers you need to add delay after sending one sms. For example, in Pakistan your sim will be blocked if you send 200 sms with in 15 minutes. Please first search how many sms you can send in within a minutes then add the delay accordingly.
Select delay after sending one sms.(in seconds)
Delay must be greater than four seconds.
Delete all bulk sms from message history.
Store bulk sms in message history.
Donate us by watching the ad.
Looks like you haven\'t send any bulk sms yet or maybe your history is turned off.

-> Get your messages across with Pro Sms Bulk Sender App. Using this platform you can quickly send any short and important message to worldwide or locally in your country. You can easily send SMS alerts or promotional messages from your mobile. The sms charges may apply for sending the messages. 

 -> This is a small and powerful application that enables users to send generic and customized SMS messages through their carrier network to contact that are listed in a .txt input file. 

 Contact Me

 email: ahsansaeed067@gmail.com
 Website: ahsensaeed.com/contact-me
All sms of recipients will be sent successfully. You can track progress in the notification bar.
All contact numbers in file is not valid. Please select different file.
A service already running for sending bulk sms please, wait until it finishes
Total no of sms to be sent:
Are you sure you want to cancel the on-going bulk sms sending operation?
We found that you don\'t have any Carrier number installed in this device. So, first add a carrier number then only you can send SMS.
Read Phone State: This let us to read the carrier numbers used on this device. You can also apply settings from which carrier numbers you want to send Bulk SMS after granting the permission.
Pro Sms Sender App requires the Read Phone State permission in order to retrieve the current used carrier number.
Please select from which carrier number you want to send the Bulk SMS. You can always change the number from settings.
The carrier%1$s is using for sending Bulk SMS. The change carrier option will be displayed when the device has multiple carrier numbers.
Carrier number used to send the Bulk SMS
Limit exceeds please send bulk sms less than thousand contacts
Contact list must not be empty!
